PRIUS C
$189,800 up

Make your debut in a car that's chic, smart and playful – just like you.

深紅色

Hop in for a fashionable drive and show the world your true colours!

EXTREIOR
   
INTERIOR
   
PERFORMANCE
   
SAFETY
   
 
 
 
 

Take centre stage with a dynamic design and streamlined exterior.

 
 
 
 
 

All new front grille

 
 

LED headlamp with auto levelling and LED front fog lamp

 
 

New StyleRear lamps

 
 

15-inch alloy wheels

Overseas model shown

 
 
 
 
 

A cosy cabin accented in alluring piano-black, for an unparalleled driving experience.

 
 
 
 
 

Electronic tuning radio /CD player with 6 speakers

 
 

Combination meter with multi-information display

    
 

Multi-function steering wheel with touch tracer display function

 
 

Piano-black accents that are both stylish and luxurious

 
 

Hybrid system

Electronically controlled CVT

ECO mode and EV mode

 

9 SRS airbags

 

HIGHLIGHTED SPECIFICATION

車身量度及重量   全長 x 全闊 x 全高  (mm) 3,995 x 1,695 x 1,450
座位容量  (連司機) 5
引擎 類型 直列式四汽缸雙頂凸輪軸16氣閥VVT-i 引擎
汽缸容量 (cc) 1,497
*最大馬力 kW (PS) / rpm 54 (73) / 4,800
*最大扭力 (kg-m) / rpms 111 (11.3) / 4,000
電動馬達 類型 同步交流電動馬達 (恆久磁石)
最大馬力 kW (PS) 45 (61)
最大扭力 Nm (kg-m) 169 (17.2)
總系統輸出 輸出最大馬力 kW (PS) 74 (101)
車身 傳動系統 電子控制無段變速系統
油耗 17.8 km/L (JC08 mode)
輪胎及輪圈 185/60R15 合金輪圈
